UPDATE AC_ENTITYFIELD
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_entity = #{guid_entity,jdbcType=varchar},
field_name = #{field_name,jdbcType=varchar},
field_desc = #{field_desc,jdbcType=varchar},
display_format = #{display_format,jdbcType=varchar},
doclist_code = #{doclist_code,jdbcType=varchar},
checkbox_value = #{checkbox_value,jdbcType=varchar},
fk_inputurl = #{fk_inputurl,jdbcType=varchar},
fk_fielddesc = #{fk_fielddesc,jdbcType=varchar},
fk_columnname = #{fk_columnname,jdbcType=varchar},
fk_tablename = #{fk_tablename,jdbcType=varchar},
desc_fieldname = #{desc_fieldname,jdbcType=varchar},
ref_type = #{ref_type,jdbcType=varchar},
field_type = #{field_type,jdbcType=varchar},
display_order = #{display_order,jdbcType=decimal},
column_name = #{column_name,jdbcType=varchar},
width = #{width,jdbcType=decimal},
default_value = #{default_value,jdbcType=varchar},
min_value = #{min_value,jdbcType=varchar},
max_value = #{max_value,jdbcType=varchar},
length_value = #{length_value,jdbcType=decimal},
precision_value = #{precision_value,jdbcType=decimal},
validate_type = #{validate_type,jdbcType=varchar},
ismodify = #{ismodify,jdbcType=char},
isdisplay = #{isdisplay,jdbcType=char},
isinput = #{isinput,jdbcType=char},
ispk = #{ispk,jdbcType=char},
isautokey = #{isautokey,jdbcType=char}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
